meanings.definition: A shape produced by a curve that bends around and crosses itself.
meanings.sent1: The artist drew a beautiful looping on the canvas.
meanings.sent2: The roller coaster had a thrilling looping that made everyone scream with excitement.
meanings.sent3: The cat played with a piece of string, creating a looping that amused everyone in the room.
meanings.sent4: Her necklace was a looping of pearls that shimmered in the sunlight.
meanings.sent5: The swirling looping of the tornado was a terrifying sight.

meanings.definition: The act of repeating a sequence of instructions in a computer program.
meanings.sent1: The programmer used a looping to make the code more efficient.
meanings.sent2: The looping in the software allowed the data to be processed quickly.
meanings.sent3: The computer got stuck in a looping, endlessly repeating the same command.
meanings.sent4: Her mind felt like it was stuck in a looping of thoughts, unable to break free.
meanings.sent5: The looping of the music in the game created a catchy rhythm.

meanings.sent1: The race track had a looping that challenged the drivers.
meanings.sent2: The looping of the conveyor belt ensured a smooth production process.
meanings.sent3: The hamster ran in a looping on its wheel, entertaining the children.
meanings.sent4: The looping of the river around the mountain created a picturesque landscape.
meanings.sent5: The looping of the dance routine added a dynamic element to the performance.
